summary: Database CSV file is used for importing and exporting table metadata from and to an **existing** database.

headers.name: name
headers.description: The name of the database schema being updated.

headers.name: description
headers.description: Description for the database schema in Markdown format.
examples: `Customer Schema` that contains all the tables related to customer entity.

headers.name: owner
headers.description: Owner names separated by ';'. For team owner, include prefix team. For user owner, include prefix user.

headers.name: tags
headers.description: Fully qualified classification tag names associated with the database schema separated by ';'.. These tags are automatically applied along with the glossary term, when it is used to label an entity.

headers.name: retentionPeriod
headers.description: Retention period of the data in the database schema. Period is expressed as duration in ISO 8601 format in UTC. Example - `P23DT23H`. When not set, the retention period is inherited from the parent database, if it exists.

headers.name: sourceUrl
headers.description: Source URL for the database schema

headers.name: domain
headers.description: Domain to which the database schema belongs to
